resources.string: Help & Planet Abbreviations:|In Glance,..|A: = AM, morn planets|P: = PM, eve planets.|AM/PM Planets in|Glance are listed..|..in order outwards|from the Sun.|UP NOW planets are listed|in order East->West.|In the widget:|Use START, UP..|..DOWN in both screens|to move time OR..|..go faster/slower.|Planet Abbreviations:
